name: transcriber-monorepo
description: Audio transcription monorepo with API and Web frontend

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.db:setup: cd apps/api && bun run db:generate && bun run db:push
scripts.install:all: cd apps/api && bun install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run db:clean && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/api/uploads/* apps/api/.env
